io

Interface IReaderWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonReaderWriter

    public interface IReaderWriter
    A ReaderWriter class interface that is used by File IO to parse data from a (file) Reader into objects, and to convert objects into a String format in a (file) Writer to output to a file.

    Can parse TaskInfo objects and AliasValuePAir objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • writeAliasesToJson

        boolean writeAliasesToJson(java.io.Writer writer,
                           AliasValuePair[] taskInfos)
        Parameters:
        writer - Outputs the JSON string to this writer.
        taskInfos - an Array of AliasValuePair to be converted into JSON format
        Returns:
        true iff successful.

      • readAliasesFromJson

        AliasValuePair[] readAliasesFromJson(java.io.Reader reader)
        Parameters:
        reader - A Reader to read a JSON string from.
        Returns:
        an array of AliasValuePairs extracted from parsing the JSON data in the reader.

      • tasksToJsonString

        java.lang.String tasksToJsonString(TaskInfo[] taskInfos)
        Parameters:
        taskInfos - an Array of TaskInfo to be converted into a string.
        Returns:
        a String containing all the data from the taskInfos array, in JSON format, pretty printed.

      • jsonStringToTasks

        TaskInfo[] jsonStringToTasks(java.lang.String jsonString)
                      throws InvalidFileFormatException
        Parameters:
        jsonString - A string formatted in Json storing the TaskInfos
        Returns:
        an array of TaskInfos extracted from jsonString
        Throws:
        InvalidFileFormatException - thrown when an error occurred during the parsing of the string.

      • writeTasksToJson

        Parameters:

        taskInfos - an Array of TaskInfo to be converted into JSON format
        Returns:
        true iff successful.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        an array of TaskInfos extracted from parsing the JSON data in the reader.
